topic.title: Schizos
topic.body: Why is ZN full of so many fucking schizos? Chill

1582577947_1DnpB2yFpVwyhA29h2rRsifGVEC1s.body:
Practice what preparedness your finances will allow. Look into basic prepping - your goal to start with should be 2 weeks of water and 2 weeks of food. Just having that much will put you way ahead of most of the population.

Keep in mind that your mental health is part of being prepared. If you're freaking out you won't make good decisions if things get really bad, so try to relax and approach this logically. Don't let emotions rule your judgement.

1582442446_1JmxhPt4FDP7rTmmaxoKdwTSDhwg5.body:
> [aeldg7pg4b](#comment_24_1NdJyMSqnWWim7ibxBvaNsMgQvqkkTXVnz): You can delete those files you don't wish to seed, but a better solution is to just place Zeronet on a separate LUKS encrypted drive and run it from there. [...]

It's pretty obvious he's talking about CP. You act like he just spat on the floor of your house just because he doesn't want literal child pornography on his fucking hard drive lmao

gtfo with your psuedorevolutionary drivel
